Title: Establishes the "childcare and early education sector on the economy act"
Summary: Establishes the "childcare and early education sector on the economy act" to study the economic impact on the state economy of quality childcare and early education programs for children aged 0-4, and afterschool programs for children aged 5-12.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to the "childcare and early education sector on the economy act"
